## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [NGS data logistics](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/introduction/tutorials/galaxy-intro-ngs-data-managment/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
